name: too_many_streams
description: Handles scenarios where too many streams are open and what users see.
author: JamesWRC

fields.label: Stream Title
fields.placeholder: The title displayed on the 'Too Many Streams' image.
fields.help_text: The title displayed on the 'Too Many Streams' image.

fields.label: Stream Description
fields.default: While this channel is not currently available, here are some other channels you can watch.
fields.placeholder: The description displayed on the 'Too Many Streams' image.
fields.help_text: The description displayed on the 'Too Many Streams' image.

fields.label: Number of channel columns
fields.placeholder: The number of columns of channels to display on the 'Too Many Streams' image.
fields.help_text: The number of columns of channels to display on the 'Too Many Streams' image.

fields.label: Static Image Path
fields.placeholder: Path to a static image to use instead of the dynamic image.
fields.help_text: Path to a static image to use instead of the dynamic image.

actions.label: Apply 'Too Many Streams' to channels
actions.description: Adds the 'Too Many Streams' stream to the bottom of all channels.

actions.label: Remove 'Too Many Streams' from channels
actions.description: Removes the 'Too Many Streams' stream from all channels.

actions.label: Save Plugin Config
actions.description: Saves the current plugin configuration to persistent storage.
